_88flair.description: Describes the flair a player is showing.

___degree.description: The visible degree for the player, or omitted entirely if not present.

___x.description: The x position of the flair on the flair sprite. Type may change but will be convertible to int.

___y.description: The y position of the flair on the flair sprite. Type may change but will be convertible to int.

$eref.description: Specifies team relevant to object, 1 for red or 2 for blue
$eref.title: Team.

$eref.description: Array that tracks the state of properties of a player/object over time. Initially 0 (prior to player start), but if a player or object is removed then values are null.

___popAnimation.description: Property seen on replays processed/saved with old version of renderer.

___fps.description: The FPS that the replay was recorded at.

$eref.description: Describes the flair a player is showing.

___degree.description: The visible degree for the player, or omitted entirely if not present.

___x.description: The x position of the flair on the flair sprite. Type may change but will be convertible to int.

___y.description: The y position of the flair on the flair sprite. Type may change but will be convertible to int.

$eref.description: Array that tracks the state of properties of a player/object over time. Initially 0 (prior to player start), but if a player or object is removed then values are null.

___me.description: 'me' if this player was the player recording, 'other' otherwise. Used for determining world center for replay rendering.

anyOf.description: old format that didn't have an array

$eref.description: Array that tracks the state of properties of a player/object over time. Initially 0 (prior to player start), but if a player or object is removed then values are null.

anyOf.description: The type of flag held by a player in a specific frame, or null if there was no flag held.
anyOf.title: Flag Value.

$eref.description: Array that tracks the state of properties of a player/object over time. Initially 0 (prior to player start), but if a player or object is removed then values are null.

___map.description: The name of the map played on in the replay.
